Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Neurology \Neu*rol"o*gy\, n. [Neuro- + -logy.] The branch of science which treats of the nervous system. [1913 Webster]

neurology n 1: the branch of medical science that deals with the nervous system and its disorders 2: (neurology) the branch of medicine that deals with the nervous system and its disorders [syn: {clinical neurology}]
